52 static constexpr int64_t kInMemoryDefaultCapacity = 1024;

59 template <class T>
60 class PARQUET_EXPORT Vector {
61  public:
62  explicit Vector(int64_t size, ::arrow::MemoryPool* pool);
63  void Resize(int64_t new_size);
64  void Reserve(int64_t new_capacity);
65  void Assign(int64_t size, const T val);
66  void Swap(Vector<T>& v);
67  inline T& operator[](int64_t i) const { return data_[i]; }
68 
69  const T* data() const { return data_; }
70 
71  private:
72  std::shared_ptr<ResizableBuffer> buffer_;
73  int64_t size_;
74  int64_t capacity_;
75  T* data_;
76 
77  PARQUET_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(Vector);
78 };

121 class PARQUET_EXPORT ChunkedAllocator {
122  public:
123  explicit ChunkedAllocator(::arrow::MemoryPool* pool = ::arrow::default_memory_pool());
124 
127  ~ChunkedAllocator();
128 
132  uint8_t* Allocate(int size);
133 
137  void ReturnPartialAllocation(int byte_size);
138 
140  void Clear();
141 
144  void FreeAll();
145 
149  void AcquireData(ChunkedAllocator* src, bool keep_current);
150 
151  std::string DebugString();
152 
153  int64_t total_allocated_bytes() const { return total_allocated_bytes_; }
154  int64_t peak_allocated_bytes() const { return peak_allocated_bytes_; }
155  int64_t total_reserved_bytes() const { return total_reserved_bytes_; }
156 
158  int64_t GetTotalChunkSizes() const;
159 
160  private:
161  friend class ChunkedAllocatorTest;
162  static const int INITIAL_CHUNK_SIZE = 4 * 1024;
163 
166  static const int MAX_CHUNK_SIZE = 1024 * 1024;
167 
168  struct ChunkInfo {
169  uint8_t* data; // Owned by the ChunkInfo.
170  int64_t size; // in bytes
171 
173  int64_t allocated_bytes;
174 
175  explicit ChunkInfo(int64_t size, uint8_t* buf);
176 
177  ChunkInfo() : data(NULLPTR), size(0), allocated_bytes(0) {}
178  };
179 
185  int current_chunk_idx_;
186 
188  int64_t next_chunk_size_;
189 
191  int64_t total_allocated_bytes_;
192 
194  int64_t peak_allocated_bytes_;
195 
197  int64_t total_reserved_bytes_;
198 
199  std::vector<ChunkInfo> chunks_;
200 
201  ::arrow::MemoryPool* pool_;
202 
206  bool FindChunk(int64_t min_size);
207 
211  bool CheckIntegrity(bool current_chunk_empty);
212 
214  int GetFreeOffset() const {
215  if (current_chunk_idx_ == -1) return 0;
216  return static_cast<int>(chunks_[current_chunk_idx_].allocated_bytes);
217  }
218 
219  template <bool CHECK_LIMIT_FIRST>
220  uint8_t* Allocate(int size);
221 };

223 // File input and output interfaces that translate arrow::Status to exceptions
224 
225 class PARQUET_EXPORT FileInterface {
226  public:
227  virtual ~FileInterface() = default;
228 
229  // Close the file
230  virtual void Close() = 0;
231 
232  // Return the current position in the file relative to the start
233  virtual int64_t Tell() = 0;
234 };
235 
238 class PARQUET_EXPORT RandomAccessSource : virtual public FileInterface {
239  public:
240  virtual ~RandomAccessSource() = default;
241 
242  virtual int64_t Size() const = 0;
243 
244  // Returns bytes read
245  virtual int64_t Read(int64_t nbytes, uint8_t* out) = 0;
246 
247  virtual std::shared_ptr<Buffer> Read(int64_t nbytes) = 0;
248 
249  virtual std::shared_ptr<Buffer> ReadAt(int64_t position, int64_t nbytes) = 0;
250 
252  virtual int64_t ReadAt(int64_t position, int64_t nbytes, uint8_t* out) = 0;
253 };
254 
255 class PARQUET_EXPORT OutputStream : virtual public FileInterface {
256  public:
257  virtual ~OutputStream() = default;
258 
259  // Copy bytes into the output stream
260  virtual void Write(const uint8_t* data, int64_t length) = 0;
261 };
262 
263 class PARQUET_EXPORT ArrowFileMethods : virtual public FileInterface {
264  public:
265  // No-op. Closing the file is the responsibility of the owner of the handle
266  void Close() override;
267 
268  int64_t Tell() override;
269 
270  protected:
271  virtual ::arrow::io::FileInterface* file_interface() = 0;
272 };

277 #pragma warning(disable : 4250)
278 #endif
279 
281 class PARQUET_EXPORT ArrowInputFile : public ArrowFileMethods, public RandomAccessSource {
282  public:
283  explicit ArrowInputFile(
284  const std::shared_ptr<::arrow::io::ReadableFileInterface>& file);
285 
286  int64_t Size() const override;
287 
288  // Returns bytes read
289  int64_t Read(int64_t nbytes, uint8_t* out) override;
290 
291  std::shared_ptr<Buffer> Read(int64_t nbytes) override;
292 
293  std::shared_ptr<Buffer> ReadAt(int64_t position, int64_t nbytes) override;
294 
296  int64_t ReadAt(int64_t position, int64_t nbytes, uint8_t* out) override;
297 
298  std::shared_ptr<::arrow::io::ReadableFileInterface> file() const { return file_; }
299 
300  // Diamond inheritance
301  using ArrowFileMethods::Close;
302  using ArrowFileMethods::Tell;
303 
304  private:
305  ::arrow::io::FileInterface* file_interface() override;
306  std::shared_ptr<::arrow::io::ReadableFileInterface> file_;
307 };
308 
309 class PARQUET_EXPORT ArrowOutputStream : public ArrowFileMethods, public OutputStream {
310  public:
311  explicit ArrowOutputStream(const std::shared_ptr<::arrow::io::OutputStream> file);
312 
313  // Copy bytes into the output stream
314  void Write(const uint8_t* data, int64_t length) override;
315 
316  std::shared_ptr<::arrow::io::OutputStream> file() { return file_; }
317 
318  // Diamond inheritance
319  using ArrowFileMethods::Close;
320  using ArrowFileMethods::Tell;
321 
322  private:
323  ::arrow::io::FileInterface* file_interface() override;
324  std::shared_ptr<::arrow::io::OutputStream> file_;
325 };

332 class PARQUET_EXPORT InMemoryOutputStream : public OutputStream {
333  public:
334  explicit InMemoryOutputStream(
335  ::arrow::MemoryPool* pool = ::arrow::default_memory_pool(),
336  int64_t initial_capacity = kInMemoryDefaultCapacity);
337 
338  virtual ~InMemoryOutputStream();
339 
340  // Close is currently a no-op with the in-memory stream
341  virtual void Close() {}
342 
343  virtual int64_t Tell();
344 
345  virtual void Write(const uint8_t* data, int64_t length);
346 
347  // Clears the stream
348  void Clear() { size_ = 0; }
349 
350  // Get pointer to the underlying buffer
351  const Buffer& GetBufferRef() const { return *buffer_; }
352 
353  // Return complete stream as Buffer
354  std::shared_ptr<Buffer> GetBuffer();
355 
356  private:
357  // Mutable pointer to the current write position in the stream
358  uint8_t* Head();
359 
360  std::shared_ptr<ResizableBuffer> buffer_;
361  int64_t size_;
362  int64_t capacity_;
363 
364  PARQUET_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(InMemoryOutputStream);
365 };
366 
367 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
368 // Streaming input interfaces
369 
370 // Interface for the column reader to get the bytes. The interface is a stream
371 // interface, meaning the bytes in order and once a byte is read, it does not
372 // need to be read again.
373 class PARQUET_EXPORT InputStream {
374  public:
375  // Returns the next 'num_to_peek' without advancing the current position.
376  // *num_bytes will contain the number of bytes returned which can only be
377  // less than num_to_peek at end of stream cases.
378  // Since the position is not advanced, calls to this function are idempotent.
379  // The buffer returned to the caller is still owned by the input stream and must
380  // stay valid until the next call to Peek() or Read().
381  virtual const uint8_t* Peek(int64_t num_to_peek, int64_t* num_bytes) = 0;
382 
383  // Identical to Peek(), except the current position in the stream is advanced by
384  // *num_bytes.
385  virtual const uint8_t* Read(int64_t num_to_read, int64_t* num_bytes) = 0;
386 
387  // Advance the stream without reading
388  virtual void Advance(int64_t num_bytes) = 0;
389 
390  virtual ~InputStream() {}
391 
392  protected:
393  InputStream() {}
394 };
395 
396 // Implementation of an InputStream when all the bytes are in memory.
397 class PARQUET_EXPORT InMemoryInputStream : public InputStream {
398  public:
399  InMemoryInputStream(RandomAccessSource* source, int64_t start, int64_t end);
400  explicit InMemoryInputStream(const std::shared_ptr<Buffer>& buffer);
401  virtual const uint8_t* Peek(int64_t num_to_peek, int64_t* num_bytes);
402  virtual const uint8_t* Read(int64_t num_to_read, int64_t* num_bytes);
403 
404  virtual void Advance(int64_t num_bytes);
405 
406  private:
407  std::shared_ptr<Buffer> buffer_;
408  int64_t len_;
409  int64_t offset_;
410 };
411 
412 // Implementation of an InputStream when only some of the bytes are in memory.
413 class PARQUET_EXPORT BufferedInputStream : public InputStream {
414  public:
415  BufferedInputStream(::arrow::MemoryPool* pool, int64_t buffer_size,
416  RandomAccessSource* source, int64_t start, int64_t end);
417  virtual const uint8_t* Peek(int64_t num_to_peek, int64_t* num_bytes);
418  virtual const uint8_t* Read(int64_t num_to_read, int64_t* num_bytes);
419 
420  virtual void Advance(int64_t num_bytes);
421 
422  private:
423  std::shared_ptr<ResizableBuffer> buffer_;
424  RandomAccessSource* source_;
425  int64_t stream_offset_;
426  int64_t stream_end_;
427  int64_t buffer_offset_;
428  int64_t buffer_size_;
429 };
